dublin_core.dcvalue: A distributed multimedia electronic patient record EPR is a central component of a medicine telematics application that supports physicians working in rural areas of South America and offers medical services to scientists in Antarctica A Hyperwave server is used to maintain the patient record As opposed to common web servers and as a second generation web server Hyperwave provides the capability of holding documents in a distributed web space without the problem of broken links This enables physicians to browse through a patient s record by using a standard browser even if the patient s record is distributed over several servers The patient record is basically implemented on the Good European Health Record GEHR architecture
